name: release-engine
description: Deterministic CLI that generates changelog snippet, release notes, and an X post from git history.

scripts.test: node -c bin/release-engine.js && node -c src/index.js && node -c src/git.js && node -c src/classify.js && node -c src/io.js && node -c src/render/changelog.js && node -c src/render/releaseNotes.js && node -c src/render/socialX.js
